General.Name: Tijaria Polypipes Limited
General.Description: Tijaria Polypipes Limited manufactures and sells pipes, sprinkle systems, conduit pipes under the Tijaria and Vikas brand names in India and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Pipes and Textiles. It offers high density poly ethylene (HDPE) pipes and coils, permanently lubricated HDPE ducts, HDPE double wall corrugated structured-wall pipes, HDPE sprinkler systems, medium density poly ethylene pipes, unplasticised ploy vinyl chloride (uPVC) rigid pipes, uPVC elastomeric seal ring fit pipes, SWR pipes and fittings, PVC-U underground drainage and sewerage pipes, polyester partially oriented yarns, polyester drawn textured yarns, polyester mink blankets, and disposable masks. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Jaipur, India.
